catalog_info.title: Studying Evolution through Models and Experiments
catalog_info.notes: January 12, 2015 - January 23, 2015. Class will be held in Armenise RM 627, HMS. To register for this course, please contact the Systems Biology Department. Course website: http://isites.harvard.edu/k100765. January 12, 2015 - January 23, 2015. Class will be held in Armenise RM 627, HMS. To register for this course, please contact the Systems Biology Department. Course website: http://isites.harvard.edu/k100765.
catalog_info.description: Intensive January course covering theoretical foundations in population genetics, genetic drift versus selection, identifying selection in genomes, advances in laboratory evolution experiments, with applications to key questions in systems biology and evolution.
